sentences: Mulle meeldib filmis näha head näitlejaid.
Tema esinemine filmis oli väga hea.
context: 'Filmis' is the inessive case (inessitive) singular form of the Estonian word 'film', meaning 'in the movie' or 'in the film'. It indicates location within something, specifically within a movie or film. This grammatical case shows where an action takes place.
